==Event Wish - Sparkling Steps (July 24th 2020)==
''Duration: July 24th 2020 12:00 ~ July 27th 2020 00:00''
[[File:Wish Sparkling Steps.png|500px|none]]
<div class = "mw-collapsible mw-collapsed">
===Description===
The limited-time character event wish Sparkling Steps is now available. During this event wish, the 5-star promotional character "Fleeing Sunlight" [[Klee]] (Pyro) and 4-star featured characters "Chivalric Blossom" [[Noelle]] (Geo), "Juvenile Galant" [[Xingqiu]] (Hydro), and "Exquisite Delicacy" [[Xiangling]] (Pyro) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

Please Note:
*Due to the limited duration of the Final Closed Beta, the wish-attempt no. guarantees that apply during the event wish Sparkling Steps will only by carried over from the previous event wish Ballad in Goblets. Save for this exception, the wish attempt no. guarantees will be calculated independently of those that apply in other wishes.
*After this event wish ends, Klee will not appear in standard wishes, while Noelle, Xingqiu, and Xiangling will continue to be available in standard wishes.
*The wish feature is in this test version is still under development, and is in no way indicative of its appearance in the final product. All content in Genshin Impact is subject to ongoing modification and optimization.
